level.heading: Rules.
level.text: The Ethics Board, pursuant to subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2, shall issue rules to implement the provisions of this subchapter, including rules for the administration of preliminary investigations, formal investigations, and hearings related to violations of the Code of Conduct or other provisions of this subchapter.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 19-124, see notes under ยง 1-1161.01.
